description: These stuffed peppers are full of sunny Greek flavours and perfect served with pita breads and a green salad.
keywords: Stuffed capsicum,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Mince,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Peanut free
name: Greek Style Stuffed Peppers with Feta & Pita Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Slice the top off each capsicum and remove the seeds. Cut the bottom of each to ensure it can stand up, then place in a large pan of boiling water for 5 minutes to soften. Remove and place upright on a lined baking tray.
Heat the oil in a large, deep pan over a medium high heat. Add the onions and cook for 3 minutes then add the beef mince and garlic and cook for another 5 minutes until nicely browned.
Add the cinnamon, oregano, paprika and tomato paste and crumbled beef stock cube and cook for 1 minute. Pour over 150ml of water and the chopped tomatoes, reduce the heat and simmer for 8 minutes.
Spoon the mince into the capsicums and top each with crumbled feta. Roast for 20 minutes, until golden.
Brush the pita breads with oil and a pinch of oregano and place in a grill pan on a high heat for 2 minutes on each side, until slightly charred. Serve with the capsicums.
